body_html:
The thread 1 use tf.device('/gpu:0') in python code to assign GPU. But to simplify the issue for easier investigation, just try https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/slim/train_image_classifier.py is enough.

run these 2 cmd:

export CUDA_​DEVICE_​ORDER = PCI_BUS_ID
export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=3

and then run train_image_classifier.py, you will notice that the true running GPU is not (PCI) 3.
